scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-webapp
scripts.init-server-subtree: git subtree add --prefix server git@github.com:grandlyon/glsdk-server.git master
scripts.init-webapp-subtree: git subtree add --prefix webapp git@github.com:grandlyon/glsdk-client.git master
scripts.init-proxy-subtree: git subtree add --prefix proxy git@github.com:grandlyon/glsdk-proxy.git master
scripts.init-subtrees: npm run init-server-subtree && npm run init-webapp-subtree && npm run init-proxy-subtree
